title: Duplex Townhouse: 3+bed Apt w/home office, backyard, parking
posting_body: ['This townhouse duplex is an absolute one of a kind stunning fully renovated 2300 sq ft of live, play, wotrk opportunity.', "It consits of a gorgeous sunlit 3-bedroom living quarters and a family play area or home office located in a classic corner limestone building with windows all aroundand and a private backyard located in the best part of Bay Ridge called Doctor's Row.", 'This is an ideal for a family with a home office.', 'Three-bedroom apartment is very spacious and tastefully decorated; multiple antique details from the last two centuries, high ceilings, Andersen doors, Built-in antique furniture, crystal and wall-mounted panel TVs; state-of-the-art bathroom with bath enclosure, powder room with bidet; great kitchen with lots of cabinets, granit countertop, recessed lightes and breakfast nook, kitchen leads to a unique dining room with an entrance to a huge very private backyard.', 'At the lower level, there is another 1100 sq ft harwood floor space which includes: 4+ rooms, restroom, walk-in bath, private street entrance, and access to the private backyard.', 'This space is ideal for someone who started their business from home or needs a quiet space for different family members to study, play, relax, or have their live-in nany close by.', 'Every room has a water connection if needed.', 'You will have access to the backyard from both levels.', 'The entire rent can be written off in tax deductions if the lower level used as an office.', 'Located at a prominent professional Bay Ridge community, in a business oriented area with plenty of restaurants, shopping, banks, medical offices in every building, 2 minutes from the R train subway station and extensive Brooklyn bus routes, five minutes from the X27 and X37 Express buses to Manhattan, and a 10 minute walk to the 69th Street Ferry to Manhattan.', 'Retired medical professionals are offering for rent this wonderful duplex where you will have place for everything: family and entertaining, and start or expand your own business.', 'Central A/C and heater combination extraquiet split system allows for temperature control in every room.', 'Laundry unit is at the lower level.', 'Parking space provides 2 car parking opprtunity.', 'Rent 8,500/month for both office and living quaters.', 'At least 2-year lease.', 'EMAIL to schedule viewing.', 'No pets please.', 'No smoking please.']
